page.title: 01CHARING
page.content: Charing is a small and pretty village that is between Ashford and Maidstone on the A20 at the Canterbury road junction. The ancient Pilgrims Way runs through Charing. Charing has many interesting things to do and see, like the church that is near the ruins of the beautiful Archbishops Palace. Many tourists are attracted to the village because of its links with the past. There are many interesting shops in the High Street. There is also a primary school and a library. Charing has some other interesting villages nearby, such as Great Chart and Little Chart, but Charing Heath is the nearest to Charing.
